special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, each player loses 3 life.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
When Into Hada is defeated, exile target permanent.
